jeopardy.category: THE MACY'S PARADE: BEHIND THE SCENES

clues.category: THE MACY'S PARADE: BEHIND THE SCENES
clues.clue: (Jon of the Clue Crew stands on a catwalk in a storeroom.) The first Macy's parade in 1924 included live bears--they scared the children, so in 1927 balloon animals debuted, including this silent cartoon cat

clues.category: THE MACY'S PARADE: BEHIND THE SCENES
clues.clue: (Jon walks in front of a parade inflatable.) The Macy's parade did not take place for three years during this decade--since rubber was in short supply, the balloons were donated to the war effort

clues.category: THE MACY'S PARADE: BEHIND THE SCENES
clues.clue: (Kelly of the Clue Crew poses in front of Snoopy.) A new version of Snoopy debuted in 2006--when he first appeared in 1968, he was dressed up as this, the way he often was atop his doghouse

clues.category: THE MACY'S PARADE: BEHIND THE SCENES
clues.clue: (Kelly reads the clue from inside a house parade float.) Macy's parade floats must fold up to be just eight feet wide and twelve and a half feet high to fit through this tunnel for the trip from New Jersey to Manhattan

clues.category: THE MACY'S PARADE: BEHIND THE SCENES
clues.clue: (Kelly presents the clue from the workshop.) This 1947 movie which used footage of actual floats gave many Americans a love for the Macy's parade
